questions.title: Combine results in a data set v
questions.description: I use Qt to develop an IOS application. I can open a sound file using the Qt file picker dialog and then I get the url to that sound file. For example, I get file:///private/var/mobile/Containers/Data/Application/4557D5E4-68BA-4341-9F4F-2A07D5E87B4D/tmp/runsomething.App-Inbox/myaudiofile.wav
questions.author: stefan

questions.title: I get I can open a sound file
questions.description: I use Qt to develop an IOS application. I can open a sound file using the Qt file picker dialog and then I get the url to that sound file. For example, I get file:///private/var/mobile/Containers/Data/Application/4557D5E4-68BA-4341-9F4F-2A07D5E87B4D/tmp/runsomething.App-Inbox/myaudiofile.wav .I use Qt to develop an IOS application. I can open a sound file using the Qt file picker dialog and then I get the url to that sound file. For example, I get file:///private/var/mobile/Containers/Data/Application/4557D5E4-68BA-4341-9F4F-2A07D5E87B4D/tmp/runsomething.App-Inbox/myaudiofile.wav So I can at that moment load the audio file into the QAudioPlayer and it works and plays. I then store this URL in a json file to later retrieve it. And the problem is that this seems to be a sort of temporary file url, because upon restart of my application, that URL does not work anymore.So, my question is how to handle this? Do I need to copy it myself to my own dir that I can create for example under the 'Library/Application Support' path: /var /mobile/Containers/Data/Application/4557D5E4-68BA-4341-9F4F-2A07D5E87B4D/Library/Application Support/App? Or is there some other way? I saw this post which allows a user to share a file with your application and seems to copy it inside your apps' storage. Then probably it will not be a 'tmp' file anymore and the link to that file will work even after application restarts. Is that how you should do it? I don't really like that approach and would like to avoid it if possible.
questions.author: elena

questions.title: I am trying to implement swagger for my django drf projallndpoint methods I don't want post put delete methodect  ebut it's displaying s
questions.description: I'm not completely clear on what you are doing. Reading text and extracting text are generally the same thing. iText won't save the text to a file for you but once you have the text you should be able to do that fairly easily. iText does a really great job of extracting text as long as it is actually text (not outlines or bitmaps). When searching this site also look for iTextSharp which is the .Net port of iText. It has more questions/answers and the code is almost completely the same for C#.
questions.author: elena

questions.title: this is second test title
questions.description: In all cases, to load data or check other properties in the page load cycle before toggling the indicators will take time, sometimes a really small time, other times much longer. In Blazor Server this is even more relevant than other JS frameworks because the client needs to connect to the server for the logic to be executed. This is the pause or delay that you experience at the start, so given that you want to show the indicator specifically during this time where there is a delay for everything in the view port, then it makes sense that the default state should be for the indicator to be visible.
questions.author: james

questions.title: this is test title
questions.description: In Blazor, we have a tendency when we are starting out to cheat and execute large complex expressions and or functions in-line with the razor template. STOP! just because you can, doesn't mean you should. I encourage all Blazor devs to try to implement a View Model pattern for managing visual states, create a discrete valued property on the view model or property/field in the code behind class and databind the any visibility or conditional statements to that property as @RBee has a demonstrated. The problem with the following @if block is that there is no way to determine a default state, the code MUST be executed to determine if the truthy or falsey branch of the nested razor template should be executed.
questions.author: stefan

questions.title: Next.js build error on Vercel but not in Local
questions.description: For evaluating conditions of visual assets that you want a default state to render first, the first logical event to use is to override the OnAfterRenderAsync method. That is rendered after the DOM has been evaluated once, so you can see that if our DOM requires code to be evaluated first, then our standard initialization logic hasn't even been executed yet. Where this can be confusing is in the example for how to Handle incomplete async actions at render
questions.author: james

questions.title: this is test title
questions.description: If you know what is going on, pls help me with this! In the meantime, if you dont know how to fix this but do know how to disable pry console to use irb for rails instead then show me how to pls.
questions.author: stefan
